about_the_game:
Let's take the Storytelling-pace of Hades, mix it with a Stat-based System like in Citizen Sleeper, add some cozinzess, spice it with German folklore and combine everything with music - that's Rheinland!
A cozy, narrative-heavy fantasy game in which you are the musician. Collect items while playing relaxing tunes to the unique, contemporary soundtrack. Be careful: since Rheinland got Roguelite-Elements you will need to start again. Your music opens new paths and reveals secrets. Do this at your own rhythm, because you cannot play wrong (at most individually!). Accompany the three siblings who find their new home in an old Oberländer. Together they travel down the River Rhine and find new comrades in a cozy but surreal and adult world.


  • making music and improvising; but without challenging rhythm game mechanics!
  • collect harmony and items - or get by with the minimum if you are not a completionist.
  • relaxed Roguelite-Mechanics without any stress.
  • local co-op: with a second Xbox controller, another player can control the second main character.
  • the Oberländer is a mobile base that you can upgrade.
  • make decisions - but at your own pace.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 Eight-Core Processor 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Let yourself be carried away by Wanderslust and travel down the medieval River Rhine with the musicians. Experience a cozy, narrative-heavy fantasy story. Gather harmony and manage your resources. The key to everything is music, so improvise your own songs since in Rheinland everyone is a musician!
